examples.content: Created new map 'Elderlands' at scale 1:50000. Validated against cartographer_map_schema.json.
Terrain layer added with metadata {elevation: hill}. Layer validated using cartographer_layer_schema.json.
Draft 'Faerun_v2_draft.png' registered. Creating metadata stub using map_template_v1.meta.json...
Metadata configuration complete. Saved to /Cartographer/maps/Faerun_v2_draft.meta.json and validated.
Map and metadata bundle exported to WF_KV_CANON under /Cartographer/v3.8/. Checkpoint recorded.
